# Processes with ppid=1 that are expected (daemons/services)

# /proc/1/stat - init/systemd
1 (systemd) S 0 1 1 0 -1 4194560 10000 20000 10 20 100 50 0 0 20 0 1 0 1 100000000 1000 18446744073709551615 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0

# /proc/100/stat - sshd (daemon, expected)
100 (sshd) S 1 100 100 0 -1 4194304 5000 0 0 0 50 25 0 0 20 0 1 0 500 50000000 500 18446744073709551615 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0

# /proc/200/stat - nginx (daemon, expected)
200 (nginx) S 1 200 200 0 -1 4194304 3000 0 0 0 30 15 0 0 20 0 1 0 1000 80000000 2000 18446744073709551615 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0

# /proc/300/stat - cron (daemon, expected)
300 (cron) S 1 300 300 0 -1 4194304 2000 0 0 0 20 10 0 0 20 0 1 0 1500 40000000 1000 18446744073709551615 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
